name: Life With Anxiety
description: In this game, you will play through a week of life as a kid with anxiety. You will play through a five-day school week and see what kinds of ‘normal’ things aren’t so normal for someone with anxiety. This game is loosely based on my experience growing up with generalized anxiety disorder. The reason I say loosely based is because anxiety can look very different for different people, so I wanted to show some things I didn’t struggle with, but many people with anxiety do. Please do not play this game if you think you will be triggered by it. Enjoy!
